title: Drawing, Design for Wallpaper of Textile with Nosegay Pattern, ca. 1900–30
title_raw: Design for Wallpaper of Textile with Nosegay Pattern
medium: gouache and graphite on heavy cream paper
inscribed: verso of mount in pen and marker:  100 - 6
dimensions:
sheet:  19 x 15 7/8 inches (50.0 40.3 cm)
image:  16 1/2 x 12 15/16 inches (41.9 x 32.9 cm)
description: Nosegays of unidentified pink, blue, and white flowers on mustard background with brown and ochre triangular geometric shapes.  Ruled border line in graphite at edge of image within one inch margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Wallpaper of Textile with Nosegay Pattern, ca. 1900–30. gouache and graphite on heavy cream paper. 
Gift of Joseph E. Bostany. 1996-26-1.
